description.originalText: Daba is just the absolute best. She was our nanny for two years and we will miss and love her forever. She is loving, attentive, hilarious, engaging, and just so positive. Communication with Daba is easy and smooth. She makes everything so fun for kids. I’ve seen her with newborns all the way up to tweens, and she is just amazing with all ages. I cannot recommend Daba enough. Our whole family adores her, and so does everyone who meets her.

description.displayText: I heartily and enthusiastically recommend Rokhaya (Daba) F. who was one of our daughter’s nanny from the age of 5 months until she went to preschool. She currently fills in for us when we have childcare gaps and has been a lifesaver in this respect. Daba is warm and caring. She has a playful and gentle touch and is better at eliciting  our daughters’ cooperation than we are. Her genuine affection for our daughters is abundantly apparent, as is their affection for her. Daba has also had very helpful suggestions about how to relieve symptoms and soothe them when sick. I highly recommend Daba without the slightest reservations.
